definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Nitrate nitrogen removal from ground water by autotrophic denitrification in a packed bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 固定牀自養反硝化去除地下水中的硝酸鹽氮。

sentences.english: Then anaerobic bacteria take that nitrate and turn it into harmless nitrogen gas.
sentences.chinese: 最後厭氧菌將硝酸鹽轉化成無害的氣體氮。

sentences.english: Nitrate content in vegetable of greenhouse cultivation is significantly higher than that of soil open in air.
sentences.chinese: 大棚栽培的蔬菜中硝酸鹽含量明顯高於露地栽培。

sentences.english: Under aerobic or anaerobic conditions, nitrates could be used as nitrogen sources.
sentences.chinese: 在好氣或厭氣條件下可以硝酸鹽爲氮源。

sentences.english: Results There nitrite was detected from the gastric juice of the poisoning patients.
sentences.chinese: 結果在患者的洗胃液及嘔吐物中均檢出亞硝酸鹽。

sentences.english: It is possible for meat to remain pinkish-red all through the cooking if it has been exposed to nitrites.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽處理過的肉烹飪時也能保持粉紅色。

sentences.english: The serum nitrate are measured with a copper-coated cadmium reduction method.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道用鍍銅鎘還原法測定血清硝酸鹽。

sentences.english: The utilization of nitrite is not restricted by ammonia in the bacterium under both aerobic and anaerobic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 糞產鹼菌在厭氧條件下還具有需硝酸鹽的固氮酶活性。

sentences.english: It is a difficult problem to decrease the amount of nitrite in a normal limit of vegetables pickling.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽含量超標一直是醃漬蔬菜生產中的一個難題。

sentences.english: The analytic methods of nitrite in edible salt were described.
sentences.chinese: 文章提出了食用鹽中亞硝酸鹽的測定方法。

sentences.english: Also the contents of nitrate was different between lanzhou suburb and Yuzhong county.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜硝酸鹽含量蘭州市郊區高於榆中縣。

sentences.english: Nitrite is used for curing meat.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽一般用於加工肉類食品。

sentences.english: N-Nitrosamine can be formed in vivo by the interaction of nitrites with secondary amines .
sentences.chinese: 亞硝胺可由其前體物質亞硝酸鹽及二級胺在體內合成。

sentences.english: Calcium channel blockers and nitrates are used to decrease LES pressure.
sentences.chinese: 鈣通道阻滯劑和硝酸鹽是用來降低LES壓力。

sentences.english: Then they immerse this electrode in a potassium nitrate electrolyte solution.
sentences.chinese: 最後他們把電極放在鈉硝酸鹽電極的溶液中進行沉澱。

sentences.english: The final reduction product of nitrate nitrogen is ammonia nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 硝酸鹽氮的最終還原產物爲氨氮。

definition: dioxin, carcinogenic heterocyclic hydrocarbon (esp. Taiwan usage)
